info.title: untitled openapi spec
info.description: The autogenerated openapi spec for your app

NoContent.description: The request has succeeded, but there is no content to render

BadRequest.description: The server would not process the request due to something the server considered to be a client error

Unauthorized.description: The request was not successful because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the requested resource

Forbidden.description: Understood the request, but refused to process it

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found

Conflict.description: The request failed because a conflict was detected with the given request params

ValidationErrors.description: The request failed to process due to validation errors with the provided values

InternalServerError.description: the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request
